title: Provides for mandatory training for members of boards of education
summary: Provides for mandatory initial and ongoing training for members of boards of education and boards of cooperative educational service in the areas of board operations, board skills and service, budget and finance, curriculum development and educational theory and policy, district operations, legal and employee relations, and the roles and responsibilities of component board members with boards of cooperative educational services.

       AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to mandatory training for
         members of boards of education

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. The education law is amended by adding a new section 1527-a
    2  to read as follows:
    3    S 1527-A. INITIAL AND ONGOING TRAINING FOR MEMBERS OF BOARDS OF EDUCA-
    4  TION AND BOARDS OF COOPERATIVE EDUCATIONAL SERVICES.  1. THE COMMISSION-
    5  ER SHALL DIRECT ALL BOARDS OF EDUCATION AND BOARDS OF COOPERATIVE EDUCA-
    6  TIONAL  SERVICES  TO ADOPT AND IMPLEMENT AND MAINTAIN RECORDS FOR PUBLIC
    7  INSPECTION ON A PROGRAM FOR THE INITIAL AND ONGOING  TRAINING  OF  NEWLY
    8  ELECTED  AND  INCUMBENT BOARD MEMBERS. SUCH INITIAL AND ONGOING TRAINING
    9  WHICH SHALL BE FOR A MINIMUM OF TWELVE HOURS ANNUALLY SHALL INCLUDE, BUT
   10  NOT BE LIMITED TO:
   11    (A) BOARD OPERATIONS;
   12    (B) BOARD SKILLS AND SERVICE;
   13    (C) BUDGET AND FINANCE;
   14    (D) CURRICULUM DEVELOPMENT AND EDUCATIONAL THEORY AND POLICY;
   15    (E) DISTRICT OPERATIONS;
   16    (F) THE SITING, ERECTION, PURCHASE, REPAIR, ENLARGEMENT AND REMODELING
   17  OF SCHOOL BUILDINGS WHICH MEET THE  REQUIREMENTS  OF  HEALTHY  AND  HIGH
   18  PERFORMANCE SCHOOLS;
   19    (G) LEGAL AND EMPLOYEE RELATIONS; AND
   20    (H)  ROLES AND RESPONSIBILITIES OF COMPONENT BOARD MEMBERS WITH BOARDS
   21  OF COOPERATIVE EDUCATIONAL SERVICES.
   22    2. FOR THE PURPOSES OF THIS SECTION,  "HEALTHY  AND  HIGH  PERFORMANCE
   23  SCHOOLS" SHALL MEAN SCHOOL FACILITIES IN WHICH THE DESIGN, CONSTRUCTION,
   24  OPERATION  AND  MAINTENANCE  MAKE USE OF ENERGY EFFICIENT AND AFFORDABLE
   25  PRACTICES AND MATERIALS; ARE COST EFFECTIVE; ENHANCE INDOOR AIR QUALITY;
